video.name: VEGAN CINNAMON ROLL COOKIES – OILFREE | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Cinnamon Roll Cookies - refined oil-free

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here— https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-cinnamon-roll-cookies/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Shortbread like cookie dough dusted with cinnamon sugar, rolled, sliced and baked for cinnamon roll bites.

Cinnamon Rolls, but in a cookie form with shortbread dough, rolled up with cinnamon sugar filling = Addictive!

These cinnamony bites are a perfect treat for fall or the holidays. No added oil in these cookies! The nut butter and nut flour makes them a sturdy shortbread like cookie, which is crisp and soft with a cinnamon sugar filling. Add an icing if you like. Change up the spice to pumpkin pie spice. These cookies are Easy, delicious and a favorite of everyone.

recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup flour ((I use unbleached all purpose))
1 tsp cinnamon (, or use other blends suh a pumpkin pie spice, chai spice etc)
oil spray or water spray as needed

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add the cashew butter, maple syrup and vanilla extract. Mix well to combine. (let sit at room temp for 10 mins so the nut butter warms and mixes easily).
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add the cashew butter, maple syrup and vanilla extract. Mix well to combine. (let sit at room temp for 10 mins so the nut butter warms and mixes easily).

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the dry ingredients to make a soft dough. Start with 3/4 cup flour and add a tbsp more at a time.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the dry ingredients to make a soft dough. Start with 3/4 cup flour and add a tbsp more at a time.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture sit for 10 mins. If still sticky, add a tbsp more flour. The dough should be smooth and not too dry and not sticky. Roll it out using some flour into a 2mm thin large rectangle.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the mixture sit for 10 mins. If still sticky, add a tbsp more flour. The dough should be smooth and not too dry and not sticky. Roll it out using some flour into a 2mm thin large rectangle.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl until well combined. Spray water or oil on the rolled out dough. Sprinkle cinnamon mixture. Roll the dough into a tight log and seal the edge with water.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl until well combined. Spray water or oil on the rolled out dough. Sprinkle cinnamon mixture. Roll the dough into a tight log and seal the edge with water.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the log chill for 15 to 30 mins. Preheat the oven to 335 deg F (168 C)
recipeInstructions.name: Let the log chill for 15 to 30 mins. Preheat the oven to 335 deg F (168 C)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice and bake for 12 mins. Cool completely. Add a sugar icing if you like. Store covered on the counter for upto 3 days, refrigerated for upto 2 weeks.
recipeInstructions.name: Slice and bake for 12 mins. Cool completely. Add a sugar icing if you like. Store covered on the counter for upto 3 days, refrigerated for upto 2 weeks.
